relatedBlades.title: Scored Among The Top 3 in 'Current Offering' in "The Forrester Wave™: Email, Messaging, and Collaboration Security Solutions, Q2 2025" report
relatedBlades.copy:
### __Enhances threat detection across modern workspaces__

We believe this recognition is a testament to Cloudflare's ability to deliver stronger security outcomes across email and collaboration tools. By combining deep malware and content analysis, real-time link inspection, and managed detection & response (MDR) services, Cloudflare helps organizations enhance threat protection and streamline SOC workflows—all in an easy-to-deploy, cloud native solution that fits into existing environments.

According to the report, "Cloudflare is a solid choice for organizations looking to augment current email, messaging, and collaboration security tooling with deep content analysis and processing and malware detection capabilities."

__Cloudflare received the highest possible scores of 5.0/5.0 in 9 criteria:__

- Antimalware and sandboxing
- Malicious URL detection and web security 
- Threat intelligence
- Content analysis and processing 
- Reporting and dashboards 
- User quarantine
- Email authentication 
- Product security
- Partner ecosystem

Register for the report to learn more.

![Image - 2025 Forrester Wave Email Security](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/17jqqmcM7731KtFR2yX8lU/4e0d85689d2cb72ee56d5506e9d63d0f/Image_Email-Messaging-And-Collaboration-Security-Solutions-Q2-2025_1.png)
